title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.202 - Alcohol misuse plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.202 - Alcohol misuse plan

State Regulations

Each operator shall maintain and follow a written alcohol
misuse plan that conforms to the requirements of this Part and the DOT
procedures concerning alcohol testing programs. The plan shall contain methods
and procedures for compliance with all the requirements of this Part, including
required testing, recordkeeping, reporting, education and training
elements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.202

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
